Text: Thank you, mate, appreciate it. Now i can play them before i get money to pay them :P. Sad thing is i used to own them, but traded them for newer games. Big mistake :(... the way gaming is going these days, most of us "old schoolers" will have to get back to old games to get "that feeling". Keep up the good work, and remember kids, if you like GoG, show them your appreciation with your dollars :D

I can get you King of Dragon Pass, GOG-Upp.

It won't be in a gog installer though. (got it ages ago)
